snippet: Pacific Rim decided to buck traditional wine industry marketing tactics and go after the millennials, investing nearly $10,000 in a social media campaign to establish its niche. The goal was to convince retailers that they should carry riesling...
abstract: Pacific Rim decided to buck traditional wine industry marketing tactics and go after the millennials, investing nearly $10,000 in a social media campaign to establish its niche. The goal was to convince retailers that they should carry riesling wines.

headline.main: Using Social Media to Promote an Underdog Wine
